channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Two men feared missing in sea off Devon beach on Christmas Day
item.description: Emergency services launched major search at Budleigh Salterton after reports of people in difficulty in the water Two men are believed to be missing i...

item.title: Renewed zeal for Boxing Day sales expected to ring up £3.8bn for retailers
item.description: High streets and online sellers set to benefit as cash-strapped consumers eke out post-Christmas bargains UK shoppers are expected to spend £3.8bn thi...

item.title: Western Australia faces bushfire threat as cold, wet and bumpy Sydney to Hobart yacht race forecast
item.description: WA facing several fire warnings as Perth temperatures exceed 40C while Melbourne on track for coldest Christmas since 2006 Get our breaking news email...

item.title: British campaigner launches legal challenge against Trump administration after deportation threat
item.description: Imran Ahmed, an anti-disinformation advocate, claims he is being targeted over his work scrutinising social media companies A British anti-disinformat...

item.title: Russian opposition leader sentenced to six years in prison
item.description: Sergei Udaltsov, Putin critic affiliated with the Communist party, convicted of justifying terrorism A court in Russia on Thursday convicted a pro-war...

item.title: Brazil ex-President Jair Bolsonaro's surgery for hernia 'successful'
item.description: The former leader is serving a 27-year sentence for plotting a coup after losing the 2022 presidential election.

item.title: Last dance for Tess and Claudia as Strictly hosts sign off
item.description: Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman embrace on the dancefloor as they sign off as hosts after 11 years.

item.title: Two men still missing after Christmas swim as coastguard calls off search
item.description: After "extensive" searches, the coastguard says its part of the search has been stood down.

item.title: Murder arrest after death of woman in her 80s
item.description: A 63-year-old woman has been arrested following an incident at a flat in Devizes.

item.title: Royal Family greet crowds after Christmas Day service
item.description: The King and Queen attend a church service alongside other family members, including Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor's daughters Princesses Beatrice and Eu...
